meanings.definition: The quality of being an electrophile.
meanings.sent1: Her electrophilicity made her a magnet for electrons.
meanings.sent2: The electrophilicity of the molecule attracted the negatively charged particles.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of electrophilicity as everyone tried to attract the attention of the guest of honor.
meanings.sent4: His electrophilicity was like a powerful magnet, drawing in all the available opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The electrophilicity of the situation was palpable, creating a charged atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The tendency of a molecule to accept electrons.
meanings.sent1: The electrophilicity of the compound allowed it to readily accept electrons.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the electrophilicity of molecules to understand their reactivity.
meanings.sent3: The cat's electrophilicity towards the laser pointer provided endless entertainment.
meanings.sent4: The city's electrophilicity for innovation attracted bright minds from all over.
meanings.sent5: The electrophilicity of the substance was so high that it quickly reacted with any available electrons.
